description: The government wants to build at least 1,500 new homes in the east of the Isle of Man by 2026.
title: Isle of Man housing plan on hold amid raft of concerns
title_page: Isle of Man housing plan on hold amid raft of concerns - BBC News
maintext: A plan to build at least 1,500 homes in the east of the Isle of Man by 2026 has been put on hold for a month amid concerns about pollution, congestion and construction on green sites.
